These ____ days ____ in ____ years ____ before ____ which ____ leap ____ in ____ Julian ____ Gregorian ____. In all common years of the Coptic and Ethiopian calendars, September 11 is New Year's Day.
data.partBlankContent: Between the years AD 1900 and 2099, September 11 of the Gregorian calendar is the leap day of the Coptic and Ethiopian calendars. These le__ days oc___ in t__ years immed______ before th___ which a__ leap ye___ in t__ Julian a__ Gregorian cale_____. data.fullContent: Between the years AD 1900 and 2099, September 11 of the Gregorian calendar is the leap day of the Coptic and Ethiopian calendars. These leap days occur in the years immediately before those which are leap years in the Julian and Gregorian calendars. In all common years of the Coptic and Ethiopian calendars, September 11 is New Year's Day.
data.answer: 从公元1900年到2099年，公历的9月11日是科普特人和埃塞俄比亚历法的闰日。这些闰日发生在儒略历和格里高利历闰年之前的年份。在科普特人和埃塞俄比亚日历中，9月11日是新年。
